title: The Writer's Almanac for Thursday, April 7, 2022
description: Today, for his 252nd birthday, we hear a poem by William Wordsworth “I Have Thoughts that Are Fed by the Sun”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today, for his 252nd birthday, we hear a poem by William Wordsworth “I Have Thoughts that Are Fed by the Sun”
